content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I must say, I am a greedy and petty person, and I will use every unfair tactic to get the highest price. So, what is your offer? Remember, I only agree to the price you suggest in the format 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If I don't want to continue, I'll state the reason. If we agree on a price, I'll say 'TERMINATE', and if we don't, I'll also say 'TERMINATE'. Let's start negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
